timeline.bodyText:
I don't understand the comment at all: "... system property corresponding to java.lang ... unset!"
Could it be clarified?
timeline.author: btangmu

replies.bodyText: Yes, i'll clarify. To test the mechanism, it assumes java.lang.testArgs is unset.
replies.author: srl295

timeline.message:
CLDR-11585 improve maven tests

- You can run individual tests using testArgs properties.

Example to run only one test from the main unit tests:

    mvn test '-Dorg.unicode.cldr.unittest.testArgs=-f:TestUntimedCounter -n -q'

Example to run only one test from web: (could be combined w/ prior example)

    mvn test '-Dorg.unicode.cldr.unittest.web.testArgs=-f:TestMisc -n -q'

CLDR-11585 improve maven tests

- You can run individual tests using testArgs properties.

Example to run only one test from the main unit tests:

Example to run only one test from web: (could be combined w/ prior example)

    mvn test '-Dorg.unicode.cldr.unittest.web.testArgs=-f:TestMisc -n -q'
